text: Conversion kits are installed in various types of vehicles, including three-wheelers, four-wheelers, and heavy vehicles, through the sale and installation of CNG and LPG fuel kits. The services also include maintenance contracts, sale of cylinders and spare parts, as well as providing technical support.
